channel.title: Linux Ubuntu
channel.description:
I am considering installing Linux, ubuntu on my computer, but I have a few questions;
1; When I install it, will it affect all users that are on the computer?
2; If I do the 'Dual Boot' option, will I get to choose which OS system to use, or will it just go to the default, then you can change it if you want.
Thanks.

And thank’s for the help everybody, I seem satisfied enough.[/quote]

Before you download and install Ubuntu make sure you happy with the GNOME desktop environment because Ubuntu is avliable with KDE and even Xfce. I Personallly prefer KDE, as will several members on this community (on mitb), but the base system looks the same.

The OS with GNOME is oviously called Ubuntu
KDE is preinstalled on Kubuntu
Xfce is preinstalled on Xubuntu
